notes: Forecast AS is full effective combat speed and should include active combat bonuses.
Promoted units gain Mast rank in all currently held weapon proficiencies.

combat.atkFormula: Atk = Weapon Might + STR/MAG + combat bonuses
combat.asFormula: AS = SPD - max(Weapon Wt - floor(STR / 5), 0) + SPD bonuses
combat.doublingRule: Double attack if your AS is at least foe AS + 5
combat.effectiveDamageRule: Effective weapons deal 3x damage vs matching move type
